    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Antiplague](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3297)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Antiplague can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking an antiplague, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

You gain a +4 item bonus, and when you drink the antiplague, you can immediately attempt a saving throw against one disease of 14th level or lower affecting you. If you succeed, you’re cured of the disease.
